title: What are the impressions of individuals who have been mesmerized by Monsieur Donato, and how did his gaze and experiments affect them?
first_phrase: This final part consists of various letters from individuals who have undergone the experiences of being mesmerized by Mr. Donato. These people come from various parts of Europe, including France, Belgium, and Italy. They describe their experiences and the effects on their health and behavior. The letters provide diverse insights, ranging from initial skepticism and disbelief to complete conviction and fascination. Some have experienced significant physical reactions, such as being unable to move or speak, while others report no negative effects on their health. The letters demonstrate the power of Mr. Donato's mesmerizing gaze and suggest the possibility of a scientific explanation.

LAGNIEZ Cher Monsieur Donato, Je n’avais jamais été magnétisé par personne quand je me suis présenté devant vous, et je pensais que c’était une chose impossible. Aussi ai-je été très surpris. A peine vous avais-je fixé, j’ai été forcé de vous suivre et de faire ce que vous vouliez de moi. Je n’ai ressenti aucun mal de ces expériences. Je suis très bien portant et je n'ai jamais eu de cauchemars ni d’attaques nerveuses. Angers, le 25 septembre 1881.
